functions.name: Util_ScarPos
functions.description_short: Converts a 2D top down position to a 3D ScarPosition. returns Position, if y-height is nil, y-height = ground height, terrain ground or walkable
description_extended: 3D ScarPositions have the x axis left to right, the z axis in to out, and the y axis down to up (y axis represents the height of the terrain).  Use this function to convert a top-down 2D position to a 3D world position.\n\n
Note: (0,0) is in the center of the map.
